blogPost.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
blogPost.body: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
blogPost.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices
blogPost.author: Ismail Mesbah

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以帮助您通过动画手部模拟来正确展示您的应用程序和服务。它的设计是为了让你的视频自明和吸引人。
localize.tagline: 为所有设备创建动画手势模拟和手势。

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以幫助您通過動畫手部模擬來正確展示您的應用程序和服務。它的設計是爲了讓你的視頻自明和吸引人。
localize.tagline: 爲所有設備創建動畫手勢模擬和手勢。

previous.title: The S&P 500 is crashing right now thanks to Tesla, which is responsible for 0.12% of its 0.44% decline.

localize.full_text: S&P 500指数现在正在崩溃，这要归功于特斯拉，它要为其0.44%的跌幅负责0.12%。
S&P 500指數現在正在崩潰，這要歸功於特斯拉，它要爲其0.44%的跌幅負責0.12%。

next.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
next.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love

localize.description: 无需钢琴谱的直观方法 不再需要知道如何解读钢琴谱或了解乐理。在几秒钟内，你就能认出要在键盘上演奏的音符。超过1,000首各种风格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜欢的歌曲轻松地在网上学习钢琴。

localize.description: 無需鋼琴譜的直觀方法 不再需要知道如何解讀鋼琴譜或瞭解樂理。在幾秒鐘內，你就能認出要在鍵盤上演奏的音符。超過1,000首各種風格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜歡的歌曲輕鬆地在網上學習鋼琴。
